A toolkit for calculating grand piano ac: A toolkit for calculating grand piano action balancing
All your wippen support springs will hav: All your wippen support springs will have the same tension.
By enabling this option, a new field wil:
By enabling this option, a new field will be added to measure Down Weight with wippen support spring attached. It will be used to calculate the Wippen Support spring (WSS) tension and display a dedicated chart in Analyze page.
This is optional, even if you want to enable WSS tension in your design.
By enabling this option, you will be abl:
By enabling this option, you will be able to manually measure the SWR for each key rather than using an automatically calculated value.
If the measured value is too far from the calculated value, a warning will be displayed to indicate that some measurements are incorrect or not accurate enough.

Choose a target strike weight ratio.

The general idea is to define a base wei: The general idea is to define a base weight that will decrease to zero starting from a specific key.
The measured SWR is not consistent with:
The measured SWR is not consistent with the computed SWR ({{computedStrikeWeightRatio}}). The difference is greater than {{difference}}.
You should check your measurements to find the source of the inconsistency.
Check the SWR chart on analyze page for more details.
